content.text: Match ends, Valencia 3, Rangers 0.
Second Half ends, Valencia 3, Rangers 0.
Pablo Hernández (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Steven Davis (Rangers).
Tino Costa (Valencia) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.
Goal!  Valencia 3, Rangers 0. Tino Costa (Valencia) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Miguel Brito with a cross.
Aritz Aduriz (Valencia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sasa Papac (Rangers).
Foul by Kyle Lafferty (Rangers).
Tino Costa (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Manuel Fernandes (Valencia) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Pablo Hernández.
Substitution, Valencia. Pablo Hernández replaces Joaquín.
Substitution, Rangers. Kyle Lafferty replaces Maurice Edu.
Attempt saved. Tino Costa (Valencia) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Steven Naismith (Rangers) hits the right post with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Madjid Bougherra with a cross.
Attempt saved. Joaquín (Valencia) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jeremy Mathieu.
Attempt missed. Manuel Fernandes (Valencia) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Attempt missed. David Navarro (Valencia) header from very close range is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Tino Costa with a cross following a corner.
Substitution, Valencia. Manuel Fernandes replaces Roberto Soldado.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Madjid Bougherra.
Goal!  Valencia 2, Rangers 0. Roberto Soldado (Valencia) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Substitution, Valencia. Tino Costa replaces Éver Banega.
Offside, Valencia. Éver Banega tries a through ball, but Aritz Aduriz is caught offside.
